worker.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
worker.introduction: Academy Award-winning actor known for performances in Inception, Titanic, and The Revenant.

worker.name: Christopher Nolan
worker.introduction: Visionary film director and screenwriter behind acclaimed blockbusters like Inception and Oppenheimer.

worker.name: Scarlett Johansson
worker.introduction: Renowned actress celebrated for roles in Lost in Translation and the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

worker.name: Hans Zimmer
worker.introduction: Award-winning composer known for his powerful film scores in Interstellar and The Dark Knight.

worker.name: Margot Robbie
worker.introduction: Australian actress and producer known for her versatility in roles from Barbie to I, Tonya.

worker.name: Roger Deakins
worker.introduction: Legendary cinematographer celebrated for his visual storytelling in films like 1917 and Blade Runner 2049.

worker.name: Zendaya
worker.introduction: Award-winning actress known for her performances in Dune and Euphoria.

worker.name: Greta Gerwig
worker.introduction: Director and writer acclaimed for Lady Bird and Barbie, blending humor and emotional depth.

worker.name: Cillian Murphy
worker.introduction: Irish actor acclaimed for intense performances in Peaky Blinders and Oppenheimer.

worker.name: Thelma Schoonmaker
worker.introduction: Academy Award-winning film editor known for her decades-long collaboration with Martin Scorsese.
